head.supplied: 19th of June [189]1. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ With reference to your letter of the 5th instant, ¶ I have the honour to inform you that the publications of the Anthropological Society at Berlin forwarded by you ar...

div.p: No 633, p. 722, unit 17, VPRS 802, Librarian's outward registered correspondence, 1864-1957, VA 913 Public Library of Victoria, Public Record Office, Victoria.

With reference to your letter of the 5th instant,
See M to T. Bride, 5 June 1891 (in this edition as 91-06-05a). I have the honour to inform you that the publications of the Anthropological Society at Berlin forwarded by you are not of any use to me as they are already in the Library, and that your request for a copy of the "Eucalyptographia" and of the "Acacias" will be submitted to the Trustees at their next meeting.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honour to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Baron Ferdinand von Mueller
In M to T. Bride 20 June 1891, the request for the bound copy of Eucalyptographia was withdrawn.
